59f3aff38bf5501e050f3468.name: Three Talon Strike
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3468.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3468.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3aff58bf5501e050f3476.name: Brutal Strikes
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3476.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3476.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f3472.name: Tumble
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3472.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3472.tooltip:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds.

Tumble's bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Vayne's total attack damage.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f3470.name: Zephyr
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3470.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3470.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) and allows movement through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f3469.name: Battle Cry
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3469.description: Xin Zhao passively will critically strike every third attack, healing on every third hit. This ability can be activated to attack faster.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3469.tooltip:
Passive: Every third basic attack Xin Zhao critically strikes his target for {{ e7 }}% additional damage. On every third hit, he heals himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}).

Active: Xin Zhao unleashes a battle cry, increasing his Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f3463.name: Conquering Sands
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3463.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3463.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f346b.name: Crescent Sweep
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346b.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist based on number of champions hit.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346b.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of target's current Health in physical damage and stuns enemies while knocking them back (max 600 vs minions and monsters). Xin Zhao gains {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds for each champion hit.

Challenge: If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f3471.name: Eye Of The Storm
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3471.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3471.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f346a.name: Audacious Charge
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346a.description: Xin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346a.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f346f.name: Howling Gale
59f3aff48bf5501e050f346f.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f346f.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds.

The whirlwind can be charged for up to {{ e6 }} seconds. For each second it charges, it deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage, knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds, and travels {{ e3 }}% further.

Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f3473.name: Silver Bolts
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3473.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3473.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ e2 }}).

Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ e3 }} damage against monsters.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f3467.name: Massacre
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3467.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3467.tooltip:
Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemy champions, filling up 20% of the Blood Well for each hit.

Aatrox gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed and {{ e5 }} attack range for {{ e8 }} seconds upon cast.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f3466.name: Emperor's Divide
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3466.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3466.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies will be stopped by Emperor's Divide, even if they attempt to dash over the wall, but Azir and his allies can pass freely through it.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f346d.name: Yordle Snap Trap
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346d.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346d.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f346c.name: Piltover Peacemaker
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346c.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
59f3aff38bf5501e050f346c.tooltip:
Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ e2 }}% less damage.

Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f3474.name: Final Hour
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3474.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3474.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed.
Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f3465.name: Shifting Sands
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3465.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3465.tooltip:
Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If Azir hits an enemy champion, his dash stops and he gains a shield for {{ e6 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} damage.

59f3aff38bf5501e050f3464.name: Arise!
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3464.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
59f3aff38bf5501e050f3464.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed.

Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks instead of Azir, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a line. If multiple soldiers strike the same target, each soldier after the first deals 25% damage.

Azir can store up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers at a time. A new soldier becomes available every {{ f1 }} seconds.

Sand Soldiers can attack targets outside of Azir's basic attack range.
Sand Soldiers deactivate if they are too far away from Azir.
Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f3475.name: Pillar of Flame
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3475.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f3475.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units within the area.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

59f3aff48bf5501e050f346e.name: Dark Matter
59f3aff48bf5501e050f346e.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands.
59f3aff48bf5501e050f346e.tooltip: After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f2.name: Challenge
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f2.description: Xin Zhao challenges his target with his basic attacks and Audacious Charge, reducing its Armor by 15% for 3 seconds.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2afc.name: Edge of Night
59f3af888bf5501e050f2afc.description:
+250 Health
+55 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +18 Lethality
UNIQUE Active - Night's Veil: Channel for 1.5 second to grant a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. Lasts for 5 seconds (45 second cooldown).

(Can move while channeling, but taking damage breaks the channel.)

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b75.name: Ardent Censer
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b75.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Your heals and shields on another allied champion grant them 25% Attack Speed and their attacks drain 25 health on-hit for 6 seconds.

(This does not include regeneration effects or effects on yourself. Bonus effects are based on target's level.)

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b48.name: Bramble Vest
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b48.description:
+35 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Thorns: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects 20 magic damage, inflicting Grievous Wounds on the attacker for 1 second.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a65.name: Eye of the Watchers
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a65.description:
+200 Health
+50% Base Mana Regen
+35 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae9.name: Righteous Glory
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae9.description:
+400 Health
+300 Mana
+30 Armor
+100% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active: Grants 75% Movement Speed when moving towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted, slowing nearby enemy champion Movement Speed by 75% for 2 second(s) (90 second cooldown).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b36.name: Zeke's Convergence
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b36.description:
+60 Armor
+30 Magic Resist
+250 Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Active - Conduit: Bind to an ally without an existing Conduit.
UNIQUE Passive: Casting your ultimate near your ally surrounds you with a frost storm and ignites your ally's basic attacks for 10 seconds. Enemies inside your frost storm are slowed by 20% and your ally's attacks burn their target for 50% bonus magic damage over 2 seconds (45 second cooldown).

Frostfire Covenant: Basic attacking a burning enemy ignites your frost storm to deal 40 magic damage per second and slow by 40% instead for 3 seconds.

(Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.)

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b4a.name: Thornmail
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b4a.description:
+250 Health
+75 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Thorns: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects magic damage equal to 10% of your bonus Armor plus 25, inflicting Grievous Wounds on the attacker for 1 second.
UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% for 1 second.

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b74.name: Frostfang
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b74.description:
+20 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+50% Base Mana Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing minions slows Tribute generation.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b73.name: Frost Queen's Claim
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b73.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Summon 2 icy ghosts for 6 seconds that seek out nearby enemy champions. Ghosts reveal enemies on contact and slow them by 40% for between 2 and 5 seconds based on how far the ghosts have traveled (90 second cooldown).
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a86.name: Spellthief's Edge
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a86.description:
+5 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+25% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 10 additional damage and grant 8 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing minions slows Tribute generation.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item and upgrade to Frostfang.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.
